page.title: 05TILLINGHAM HALL
page.content: Tillingham Hall is the proposed development of a country town between {Bulphan}and{West Horndon.}Consortium Developments propose to build 5000 houses on{green belt}land. The Bulphan and West Horndon villagers don't agree with this. There are two M.P.s involved. They are{Harvey Proctor}and {Bob McCrindle}. There has been a Residents Association formed. They are totally against it. Nearly everyone in Bulphan and West Horndon are against it. We are afraid that such a development will totally destroy the{atmosphere}of village life in these parts. There have been many recent reports in the {national}and{local newspapers. { Channel 4}and{Anglia Television}have both visited our village recently to make programmes about the argument.
